discourse_list.title: Community Call: Opolis for MakerDAO Contributors and Teams | Feb 23, 17:00 UTC

content.content: Community Call: Opolis for MakerDAO Contributors and Teams | Feb 23, 17:00 UTC  Maker Youtube February 23 20211280×720 39.2 KB  Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-02-23T17:00:00Z  Join Details Join through the Crowdcast Event Page.  Agenda Intro by @Davidutro. Presentation by John Paller or Team Open Q&A  Information About Opolis Opolis is a Member-Owned Digital Employment Cooperative that offers Benefits, Payroll & Shared Services for the Independent Worker.  What is the Opolis Employment Commons? The Employment Commons is a Limited Cooperative Association registered in the State of Colorado. Its purpose is to provide Benefits, Payroll and Shared Services for independent workers like solopreneurs, sole-practitioners, independent contractors, gig workers, digital nomads, freelancers and the like. Opolis, Inc. is the elected “Trustee” which provides services (administrative, marketing, technology) to the Commons and its Members. Together we are the Opolis Employment Commons.  What geographies are currently open for Membership? Currently, Employee Membership is limited to individuals who are qualified to work in the United States. International expansion is expected to begin for Employee Membership sometime in 2021.
